  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">A les vuit em llevo</string>
            <string language="en">I get up at eight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich stehe bei acht auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Je me lève à huit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu levanto-me em oito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mi alzo ad otto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σηκώνομαι σε οκτώ</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva per treballar els termes a.m. (abans del migdia / ante meridiem) i p.m. (després del migdia / post meridiem) i l'escriptura de les hores relacionades amb diferents accions del dia. Conté una activitat introductòria dels continguts que s'han de treballar, una activitat pràctica i una activitat d'avaluació. Està adreçada a alumnes de cicle mitjà.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) to practise a.m. and p.m. and the times of different daily actions. It includes an introductory activity on the subject, a practice exercise and a self-assessment activity. The unit is aimed at 8- to 10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) zum von von a.m. und von von P.M. und von von Zeiten der 
unterschiedlichen täglichen Tätigkeiten zu üben. Er schließt
eine einleitende Aktivität auf dem Thema, einer Übung und einer 
Selbstbewertung Aktivität ein. Die Maßeinheit wird 8 zu 
10-year-olds angestrebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) pour
pratiquer heure du matin et P.M. et les temps de différentes actions 
quotidiennes. Elle inclut une activité préliminaire sur le 
sujet, un exercice pratique et une activité de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment. 
L'unité est visée 8 à 10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) para 
praticar o a.m. e o p.m. e os tempos de ações diárias diferentes. 
Inclui uma atividade introdutória no assunto, em um exercício 
de prática e em uma atividade do self-assessment. A unidade é 
visada 8- a 10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) per 
esercitarsi nel a.m. e p.m. ed i tempi delle azioni quotidiane 
differenti. Include un'attività introduttiva sull'oggetto, su 
un'esercitazione di pratica e su un'attività di valutazione di se 
stesso. L'unità è puntata su 8 a 10-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στην 
πρακτική π.μ. και μ.μ. και τους χρόνους των διαφορετικών 
καθημερινών ενεργειών. Περιλαμβάνει μια εισαγωγική 
δραστηριότητα στο θέμα, μια άσκηση πρακτικής και μια 
δραστηριότητα αυτοαξιολόγησης. Τη μονάδα στοχεύουν σε 8 στο 
10-έτος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
